infotexts.jobdescription.ThalamusJob: Once human, once husk, now - a sentient plant, called Thalamis
infotexts.talentdescription.friendlyvine: Thalamis appearance becomes less disturbing, and its crewmates no longer suffer psychosis because of it
infotexts.talentdescription.toxicbehaviour: Instead of being completely immune to acid damage, you now heal from it
infotexts.talentdescription.rootforyou: You no longer can be pushed by water currents
infotexts.talentdescription.innerpores: You can hold onto your water and keep yourself hydrated for longer
infotexts.talentdescription.calmingpheromones: Makes your crewmates less susceptible to psychosis, including your own
infotexts.talentdescription.greenthumb: You can now craft special fertilizers and good ol' fertilizer, but cheaper
infotexts.talentdescription.innernature: You can now craft a diving suit to keep yourself hydrated for as long as you don't take it off. It's a little heavier due to all the water
infotexts.talentdescription.powervine: You are now immune to electrocution, and gain a small buff from it
infotexts.talentdescription.kelpme: Your closest crewmate gains extra 15 points in mechanics, electrical and medicine
infotexts.talentdescription.natureconservation: After having your vitality dropped to below 0, you gain 75% resistance and are paralyzed
infotexts.talentdescription.powerplant: You can craft a power generating mountable gland, which constantly emits a small current. Stronger underwater, limit of 2
infotexts.talentdescription.luringgland: You can craft a luring mountable gland, which can be turned on and off manually or with signals and emits a decoy noise
infotexts.talentdescription.lightbulb: You can craft a light bulb, a portable mountable light source. Can emit light in inventory. Stronger underwater
infotexts.talentdescription.capacitorbulb: You can craft a capacitor bulb, an energy-storing mountable. Limit of 2, is 2 times weaker that a battery cell
infotexts.talentdescription.wrappinggland: You can craft a mountable wrapping gland. Can only be held in both hands. Treats bleeding of everyone around it, and slows hostiles. Needs power. Stronger undderwater. Limit of 2
infotexts.talentdescription.thunderbulb: You can craft a mountable thunder bulb. Can only be held in both hands. Electrocutes everyone around it, requires power. Limit of 2
infotexts.talentdescription.pumpinggland: You can craft a mountable pumping bulb. Can only be held in both hands. Does not require power, but is more powerful when powered. Can be signal-controlled, limit of 2
infotexts.talentdescription.buyoancegland: You can craft a mountable buyoance bulb. Can only be held in both hands. Does not require power, but is more powerful when powered. Can be signal-controlled, limit of 2
infotexts.talentdescription.breatheitin: Disables need for hydration, but you also lose benefits of being hydrated. Glands/bulbs are not affected
infotexts.talentdescription.torchplant: You gain 25% resistance to fire damage
infotexts.talentdescription.houseplant: You can use fertilizer to heal yourself faster. Becomes even more powerful if you are hydrated and without "breathe in in" trait
infotexts.talentdescription.endoskeleton: Increases walking speed by 20%, decreases swimming speed by 10%
infotexts.talentdescription.gardenerdidit: You can now craft a ballast-flora killing spray. Never aim at thalamis crewmates
infotexts.talentdescription.slipperycarapace: There's a 10% chance to stun the attacker for 1 second
infotexts.talentdescription.nestmind: Your crew, including you, gains 25% more experience
infotexts.talentdescription.biotuned: Your non-thalamis crewmates gain slow regeneration when you're around
infotexts.talentdescription.foresttitan: Increases your character in size by giving it an exosuit that CANT BE TAKEN OFF. It gives 50% damage resistance from all sources but fire and cuts, makes you immune to flowing water and slows you down by 20%. Does not need power.
infotexts.talentdescription.gardenwarfare: You can now craft new seeds and weapons. All plants must be planted in water. Refer to mod page if you need extra info
infotexts.talentdescription.lateblooming: You gain 10%+ movement and swinging speed when below 50% vitality, this caps at 25% speed at 10% vitality
infotexts.talentdescription.plantsvszombies: Husks around you are up to 50% slowed (gradually) and after some time get paralized
infotexts.talentdescription.stomped: When your health is at -75, disables your regeneration and paralizes you, but gives 90% resistance to all damage
infotexts.talentdescription.organicfuels: Upon dying, explode in flames. Can start a fire
infotexts.talentdescription.corrosive: Upon dying, explode in a cloud of highly corrosive acid
infotexts.talentdescription.immuneresponse: Upon dying, release 3 terminal cells to attack any non-thalamis they can find
